name: AttheLabPodcast
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The At the Lab podcast dives into Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory's (CSHL) breakthrough bioscience research in cancer, neuroscience, plant biology, and genomics, and brings you the latest discoveries with the potential to change lives and the world all this in 3 minutes or less. Get the latest research from Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory weekly in your flash briefing.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
